ALLIANCE_MCP_SERVER.description: The URL of the Running Alliance MCP Server

UUIDS.description: Python list of UUIDs for teammate identification (e.g., ['uuid1', 'uuid2', ...])

TEAM_SECRET.description: Secret key for HMAC message signing and verification among teammates

NAMES.description: Nested Python list of agent names [[names_for_uuid1], [names_for_uuid2], ...]

LANGSMITH_TRACING.description: Enable LangSmith tracing (set to 'true' to enable)

LANGSMITH_API_KEY.description: Your LangSmith API key for tracing and monitoring

LANGSMITH_PROJECT.description: LangSmith project name for organizing traces (optional)

LANGSMITH_ENDPOINT.description: LangSmith endpoint URL (optional, defaults to https://api.smith.langchain.com)
